source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SEQ_00<tab>Tapklix has lost his patience with the goblins who are supposed to be guarding the settlement.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SEQ_00<tab>ショートストップ野営地のタップクリクスは、集まらない見張りに怒っている。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SEQ_01<tab>Tapklix is furious that none of the goblins who are guarding Bigwest Shortstop have returned to the camp. The Illuminati have been spotted dangerously close to the camp, but no guards have regrouped to defend it. Find the guards and tell them to return to Bigwest Shortstop. Their posts are at the Makers' Quarter and the Collectors' Quarter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SEQ_01<tab>タップクリクスは、「青の手」が侵入しているにも関わらず、一向に集まる気配のない見張りたちに気をもんでいるようだ。低地ドラヴァニアのシャーレン工匠街とシャーレアン選者街で、見張りのゴブリン族を3名探そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SEQ_02<tab>You find the guards and convince them to return to Bigwest Shortstop. Return there yourself and make sure all of the goblins have made it back safely.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SEQ_02<tab>見張り全員に声をかけた。ショートストップ野営地の「タップクリクス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SEQ_03<tab>Although the guards have all made it back to Bigwest Shortstop successfully, it seems there is a fundamental problem. None of the goblins can agree on the correct procedure for when they should regroup to defend the camp. But the entire patrol force itself is pointless if they are unable to mount an organized defense. For now, Tapklix will lead the goblins in driving off the Illuminati attack, but he asks you to go to Slowfix and advise him of this worrying situation.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SEQ_03<tab>どうやら、防衛ラインの認識が全員バラバラだったようだ。タップクリクスから、今回のことをスローフィクスに伝えるよう頼まれた。イディルシャイアの「スローフィクス」に今回の件を報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SEQ_04<tab>Slowfix is not surprised to learn that the goblin guards are unable to agree on the correct rules, because Idyllshire has no rules! Idyllshire is intended as a “free nation for free people.” Rules, procedures, and laws─anything that robs the goblins of their rights and freedom─would run counter to this ideal.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SEQ_04<tab>スローフィクスに、防衛ラインの件を報告した。スローフィクスは、自由な国の自由さに、少し不安になってきたようだ。
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TODO_00<tab>見張りのゴブリン族を探す
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TODO_02<tab>イディルシャイアのスローフィクスに報告

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_000Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Illuminati draw near, but gobbie watchguards do not return to camp!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_000シュコォ……シュコォ……
見張り役たち　もどってこない
「青の手」きたのに　もどってこない！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_001<tab>Plan is for watchguards to gather and launch backstrike from here if Illuminati approach. But no gobbies gather here at all!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_001「青の手」　都市に　近づいたなら
見張りの役は　ここ集合　応戦作戦　立てる決まり。
だけど　ぜんぜん　集まらない～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_002<tab>Uplander, please find watchguards and tell them to return! Watchguards should be at Makers' Quarter and Collectors' Quarter.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_002あにた　ちょっと　行ってきて！
見張りを　3人　呼んできて！
「工匠街」と「選者街」　そこに　みんな　いるはずよ～。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_005<tab>Find watchguards at Makers' Quarter and Collectors' Quarter. Tell them to return here with fastness!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_005あにた　ちょっと　行ってきて！
見張りを　3人　呼んできて！
「工匠街」と「選者街」　そこに　みんな　いるはずよ～。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYA01937_000_010Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Hmmm? Illuminati are near? I must return with fastness to Bigwest Shortstop!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYA01937_000_010シュコォ……シュコォ……
ほえ～？　「青の手」　侵入した～？
それなら　いそいで　戻らなきゃ～。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYB01937_000_020Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Illuminati!? I did not know! Thank you, uplander. I return to camp now.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYB01937_000_020シュコォ……シュコォ……
「青の手」　侵入したなんて　気づかなかった～。
わざわざ　おしらせ　ありがとさん！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYB01937_000_030Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Yes. I saw Illuminati. But they were not close to camp. Not really close.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYB01937_000_030シュコォ……シュコォ……
「青の手」　たしかに　いたけれど
都市には　そんなに　近くない！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYB01937_000_031<tab>But if Tapklix asks us to return, I have no choice. I return now.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYB01937_000_031でもでも　タップクリクス　呼んでるならば
仕方がないから　すぐ帰る！

TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYA01937_000_047シュコォ……シュコォ……
「青の手」　侵入　本当なの～？

TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYB01937_000_048シュコォ……シュコォ……
おかしい　「青の手」　どこいるの？

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYC01937_000_049Pshhh... Shkohhh...
What!? There is no sign of Illuminati!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYC01937_000_049シュコォ……シュコォ……
「青の手」　どこにも　見当たらない！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_040Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Uplander! Thank you for finding watchguards!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_040シュコォ……シュコォ……
あにた　呼んできてくれて　ありがと～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_041<tab>But watchguards, you are all <var 1A 02 /var>too slow<var 1A 01 /var>! Illuminati draw very close, but you not return! Rule is simple: return to Bigwest Shortstop if Illuminati pass boulder!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_041それにしても　みんな　集まるの遅い。
「青の手」　侵入したのに　なにしていたの！
岩を　越えたら　集合だって　決めたでしょ～！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYA01937_000_042Pshhh... Shkohhh...
No, no! Rule is: return when Illuminati pass watercross! Not boulder!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYA01937_000_042シュコォ……シュコォ……
違うよ　岩じゃ　ないないよ～
橋を　越えたら　集合よ～！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYB01937_000_043Pshhh... Shkohhh...
No, no, no, no! Not boulder. Not watercross. Ruins! Rule is: return when Illuminati pass ruins!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYB01937_000_043シュコォ……シュコォ……
岩でも　橋でも　違ってる！
廃墟　越えたら　集合だって　決まってる！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYC01937_000_044Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Wait! Boulder? Which boulder!? Tapklix, you not tell us which boulder!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYC01937_000_044シュコォ……シュコォ……
そもそも　岩って　どこの岩？
タップクリクスの　決まりは　聞いてない！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_045Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Why you all have different rule!? Patrol is un-useful if you do not report!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_045シュコォ……シュコォ……
……なんで　みんな　ば～らばら？
これは　報告しないと　ダメみたい！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_046<tab>Uplander, tell Slowfix about this, please. We will stop Illuminati, but please report problem to Slowfix.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_046あにた　「スローフィクス」に　伝えてちょうだい！
わたしたち　「青の手」　追い返すから
そっちは　よろしく　お願いね～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_052<tab>Uplander, we will stop Illuminati, you please tell Slowfix about problem.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_TAPKLIX_000_052あにた　「スローフィクス」に　伝えてちょうだい！
わたしたち　「青の手」　追い返すから
そっちは　よろしく　お願いね～！

TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYC01937_000_053シュコォ……シュコォ……
みんな　ほんとに　適当すぎる～。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYC01937_000_054Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Is it possible to have too much freedom?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYC01937_000_054シュコォ……シュコォ……
自由すぎるのも　考えものね～。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYC01937_000_055Pshhh... Shkohhh...
All gobbies have different understanding of plan!?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SENTRYC01937_000_055シュコォ……シュコォ……
みんなの　にんしき　ず～れずれ～。

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SLOWFIX_000_050Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Uplander! What brings you to Idyllshire?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SLOWFIX_000_050シュコォ……シュコォ……
おやおや　あらあら　どうしたゴブ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SLOWFIX_000_051<tab>Ah! But that is expected. Gobbie fightyforce is independent! To have rules would rob gobbies of gods-given liberties!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SLOWFIX_000_051なるほど　それは　当然ゴブ。
防衛ラインは　適当だから
見張りの自由に　させてるゴブ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SLOWFIX_000_052<tab>Free nation for free people should have no rules! This is best. ...No?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ807_01937_SLOWFIX_000_052「自由の都市」に　決まりは　ないけど……
本当にこれで　大丈夫ゴブ？
